# Contribute to Sudan Blueprint

We welcome contributions from researchers, practitioners, NGOs, and local actors.

### What You Can Share

-   **Case Studies** – real-world examples of implemented projects
-   **Toolkits** – step-by-step guides, implementation frameworks
-   **Insights** – evaluations, lessons learned, policy briefs

### How to Contribute

1.  Fork the repository
2.  Use one of the templates in the `/templates` folder
3.  Submit a pull request OR open an issue with your draft

See the [case study template](../templates/case-study-template.qmd) and [toolkit template](../templates/toolkit-template.qmd) for guidance.

If you're not familiar with GitHub, email us at `contact@sudanblueprint.org` and we’ll help you onboard.

### License & Attribution

By contributing, you agree to share under the [CC BY 4.0](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/) license.
